key.name: lock-hotkey
key.description: The keyboard shortcut to activate the stealth lock. Default is Super+Control+L.

key.name: debug-mode
key.description: Enables debugging features such as additional logging and an emergency abort hotkey. When enabled, the abort hotkey will unlock without a password.

key.name: debug-abort-hotkey
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to abort the lock when Debug Mode is enabled. This unlocks without a password and should only be used for debugging.
